Name: StarMech
About the game: StarMech is a bullet hell shooter where you transform between fighter and mech modes to destroy constant waves of enemies and bosses. Gather the fuel you need to warp out before you are devoured by a black hole. Each death rewards you with credits to upgrade your starmech in the hopes that you can survive for longer. The game is currently in Beta with an Roadmap and Early Access coming soon.
